Prosecute.definition: to institute and carry forward legal action against for redress or esp. punishment of a crime 2
Prosecute.origin: [Latin prosecutus , past participle of prosequi to pursue]

1.definition: to institute and carry forward legal action against for redress or esp. punishment of a crime

2.definition: to institute and carry on a lawsuit with reference to [every action shall bein the name of the real party in interest "Rule 17(a)"]to institute and carry on a civil or criminal action
2.prosecuted: in the name of the real party in interest "
